method.name: Industry EBITDA Multiple
method.description: The Industry EBITDA Multiple method values the company based on its Earnings Before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation, and Amortization (EBITDA), multiplied by an industry-standard multiple. This method assumes that similar companies within the industry are valued similarly, providing a quick estimate based on industry norms.
